Activity: Log in to the system and check emails. Respond to any urgent requests. Review yesterday's performance optimization efforts.
Run the complete data transformation process on the entire dataset in a test environment. Closely monitor the process and address any errors or issues that arise.
Prepare a summary report of the data transformation process. Include details on the data sources, data transformation steps, performance metrics, and any issues encountered.

Share the summary report with @itpm-1, @ehrdev-1, @da-2, and @qatest-1. Schedule a meeting to discuss the results and plan for the next steps. Topic: Review of Data Transformation Process and Planning for Next Steps
Lunch Break - Celebrate the end of the week.
Attend the meeting to discuss the data transformation results and plan for the next steps.
Based on the meeting discussion, finalize the data transformation scripts and documentation.
Create a backup of the final data transformation scripts and documentation.
Write a summary of the week's accomplishments and challenges. Document any lessons learned and recommendations for future tasks.
Final check of emails and project management tools. Submit the summary report. Prepare for the weekend.
